channel.title: PI pet system
channel.description:
I was adding an Re-Organized Pet syste and i get this errors
src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:91: error: cannot find symbol newNPC.summonedBy = c.playerId; ^ symbol: variable summonedBy location: variable newNPC of type NPC src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1397: error: cannot find symbol Client slaveOwner = (Server.playerHandler.player s[npcs[i].summonedBy] != null ? (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].su mmonedBy] : null); ^ symbol: variable summonedBy location: class NPC src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1397: error: cannot find symbol Client slaveOwner = (Server.playerHandler.player s[npcs[i].summonedBy] != null ? (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].su mmonedBy] : null); ^ symbol: variable summonedBy location: class NPC src\server\model\npcs\PetHandler.java:81: error: method followPlayer in class Pl ayerAssistant cannot be applied to given types; c.getPA().followPlayer(c.playerIndex); ^ required: no arguments found: int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors
can anyone help me to fix them?

item.title: PI pet system
item.dc:creator: @ljoxaa ljoxaa
item.description:
@ljoxaa wrote:

Thank you very much, i did know about the summonedBy int but i have typed it in wrong file. thanks from help)

Read full topic

item.title: PI pet system
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

c.getPA().followPlayer(c.playerIndex);
remove the c.playerIndex from the above^
and you need to declare the int summonedBy

Read full topic

item.title: PI pet system

item.description:
@ljoxaa wrote:

I was adding an Re-Organized Pet syste and i get this errors

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:91: error: cannot find symbol newNPC.summonedBy = c.playerId; ^ symbol: variable summonedBy location: variable newNPC of type NPC src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1397: error: cannot find symbol Client slaveOwner = (Server.playerHandler.player s[npcs[i].summonedBy] != null ? (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].su mmonedBy] : null); 
     ^

Client slaveOwner = (Server.playerHandler.player
s[npcs[i].summonedBy] != null ? (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].su
mmonedBy] : null);

                                                                         ^

ayerAssistant cannot be applied to given types;
